page.title: 15EDUCATION KILGRASTON SCHOOL
page.content: { { 140 boarders, 70 day girls. Studying for Scottish 0 and H grade exams and for Cambridge A level. Games and activities; hockey, netball, cross-country, tennis, athletics, skating, swimming, riding, judo. Duke of Edinburgh scheme involes expeditions to the mountains. Accommodation - cubicles in dormitories for younger girls. Study bedrooms for the seniors. A big building programme is just starting for new laboratories. School involves local area. Seniors visit old people regularly. Garage benefits by providing taxis and mini-bus for outings. Village shop sells more sweets!.
